content.text: Match ends, FC Bayern München 2(5), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(4).
Second Half ends, FC Bayern München 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 2.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 2. Max Kruse (Borussia Mönchengladbach) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Javi Martínez (FC Bayern München) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Borussia Mönchengladbach. André Hahn draws a foul in the penalty area.
Foul by Robert Lewandowski (FC Bayern München).
Álvaro Domínguez (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Ibrahima Traoré tries a through ball, but André Hahn is caught offside.
Offside, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Raffael tries a through ball, but Julian Korb is caught offside.
Pierre-Emile Højbjerg (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1. Max Kruse (Borussia Mönchengladbach) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Holger Badstuber (FC Bayern München) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Attempt blocked. Max Kruse (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mahmoud Dahoud.
Substitution, FC Bayern München. Lucas-Julian Scholl replaces Franck Ribéry.
Attempt missed. Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Max Kruse.
Foul by David Alaba (FC Bayern München).
André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, FC Bayern München. Pierre-Emile Højbjerg replaces Claudio Pizarro.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Franck Ribéry (FC Bayern München) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Robert Lewandowski.
Attempt missed. Robert Lewandowski (FC Bayern München) right footed shot from more than 40 yards on the right wing misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Julian Korb.
Second Half begins FC Bayern München 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
First Half ends, FC Bayern München 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Robert Lewandowski (FC Bayern München) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sebastian Rode.
Attempt saved. Sebastian Rode (FC Bayern München) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Javi Martínez.
Foul by André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Rafinha (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt blocked. Rafinha (FC Bayern München) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Franck Ribéry with a cross.
Corner,  FC Bayern München. Conceded by Marvin Schulz.
Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Juan Bernat (FC Bayern München).
Attempt saved. Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Raffael with a through ball.
Foul by Sebastian Rode (FC Bayern München).
Håvard Nordtveit (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  FC Bayern München. Conceded by Álvaro Domínguez.
Attempt blocked. Claudio Pizarro (FC Bayern München) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Franck Ribéry.
Attempt missed. Robert Lewandowski (FC Bayern München) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Rafinha with a cross.
André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gianluca Gaudino (FC Bayern München).
Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sebastian Rode (FC Bayern München).
Foul by Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Franck Ribéry (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Max Kruse.
First Half begins.
Penalty Shootout ends, FC Bayern München 2(5), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(4).
Penalty missed! Still  FC Bayern München 2(5), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(4). Julian Korb (Borussia Mönchengladbach) hits the bar with a right footed shot.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(5), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(4). Javi Martínez (FC Bayern München) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty saved! Oscar Wendt (Borussia Mönchengladbach) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the top left corner.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(4), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(4). Pierre-Emile Højbjerg (FC Bayern München) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(3), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(4). Max Kruse (Borussia Mönchengladbach) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Penalty saved! Rafinha (FC Bayern München) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the centre of the goal.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(3), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(3). André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(3), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(2). Holger Badstuber (FC Bayern München) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(2), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(2). Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(2), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(1). David Alaba (FC Bayern München) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(1), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2(1). Håvard Nordtveit (Borussia Mönchengladbach) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
Goal!  FC Bayern München 2(1), Borussia Mönchengladbach 2. Robert Lewandowski (FC Bayern München) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty Shootout begins FC Bayern München 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 2.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
